,11.436485166455963,22.07528445006321,0.8048992664939995,0.7886672334368018,['Minnesota Amendment 1, Continue to Provide Lottery Revenue to Environment and Natural Resources Fund Amendment (2024)']","['“Failure to vote on a constitutional amendment will have the same effect as voting no on the amendment.To vote for a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “Yes” on that question. To vote against a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “No” on that question.Environment and Natural Resources Trust Fund RenewalShall the Minnesota Constitution be amended to protect drinking water sources and the water quality of lakes, rivers, and streams; conserve wildlife habitat and natural areas; improve air quality; and expand access to parks and trails by extending the transfer of proceeds from the state-operated lottery to the environment and natural resources trust fund, and to dedicate the proceeds for these purposes?YesNo[5]”']","# Ballot for Lyon County, Minnesota
- **Claudia De La Cruz** (Party for Socialism and Liberation)

## Minnesota Amendment 1, Continue to Provide Lottery Revenue to Environment and Natural Resources Fund Amendment (2024)

“Failure to vote on a constitutional amendment will have the same effect as voting no on the amendment.To vote for a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “Yes” on that question. To vote against a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “No” on that question.Environment and Natural Resources Trust Fund RenewalShall the Minnesota Constitution be amended to protect drinking water sources and the water quality of lakes, rivers, and streams; conserve wildlife habitat and natural areas; improve air quality; and expand access to parks and trails by extending the transfer of proceeds from the state-operated lottery to the environment and natural resources trust fund, and to dedicate the proceeds for these purposes?YesNo[5]”

## Lyon County Soil and Water Supervisor District 1

## Lyon County Soil and Water Supervisor District 5
## Minnesota Amendment 1, Continue to Provide Lottery Revenue to Environment and Natural Resources Fund Amendment (2024)

“Failure to vote on a constitutional amendment will have the same effect as voting no on the amendment.To vote for a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “Yes” on that question. To vote against a proposed constitutional amendment, fill in the oval next to the word “No” on that question.Environment and Natural Resources Trust Fund RenewalShall the Minnesota Constitution be amended to protect drinking water sources and the water quality of lakes, rivers, and streams; conserve wildlife habitat and natural areas; improve air quality; and expand access to parks and trails by extending the transfer of proceeds from the state-operated lottery to the environment and natural resources trust fund, and to dedicate the proceeds for these purposes?YesNo[5]”
